description.narrative: Government and communities are better positioned to improve the coverage and quality of early learning and development.,which contributes to Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023, more children have improved and meaningful learning outcomes

sector.narrative: System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary standards and governance
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary teaching and learning environment (including curriculum and material design)

title.narrative: Sierra Leone United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Sierra Leone 2018 Annual Report on Results for Children
Sierra Leone 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Sierra Leone 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government and communities are better positioned to improve the coverage and quality of early learning and development.
Service Delivery - Early learning - ECD facilitators/teachers who received training with funding provided by UNICEF
Service Delivery - Early learning - ECD centres that provide Integrated ECD services based on national standards
System Strengthening - Early learning - Existence of national policy, leadership and budget for early learning - score (1-4), see guidance
